content:
Hi everyone :)
I'm a Japanese software developer. Have been using Rust for about 2 years for fun, and it's been the most wonderful experience I've ever had in my programming life!
Recently I contribute to the Deno project, particularly its linter deno_lint. I believe this experience makes myself be skillful enough to do something valuable for the rust-lang project. Also, I'm sure that what I will learn from the rust-lang project is absolutely beneficial to improving Deno even better! This is why I decided to join here.
Hopefully I will become a member of the rust-lang organization in the future :grinning: it must be exciting!

Anyway, nice to meet you all!
